General.Name: Aurea SA
General.Description: Aurea SA engages in the recycling of black motor oil in France. The company is also involved in the manufacturing of remold tires from used tires and recycling rigid PVC. It recycles plastics and packaging products; refines and recycles aluminum; recycles copper and produces copper alloys; and treats and recycles zinc, lead, and cadmium. In addition, the comany engages in the treatment and decontamination of mercury waste. The company was formerly known as AUER and changed its name to Aurea SA in 1988. Aurea SA is based in Paris, France.
